==========
PingdomLib
==========

v0.1.1
------

This library exposes the functionality of the pingdom API for usage within
python. 


TODO
====

API Calls
---------

* Checks (incomplete documentation, can check and add but not yet delete)
* Contacts
* Credits
* Probes
* Reference
* Reports.email
* Reports.public
* Reports.shared
* Results
* Servertime
* Settings
* Summary.average
* Summary.outage
* Summary.perforamnce
* Summary.probes
* Single
* Traceroute

Other features
--------------
* Gzip Compression, enabled by default
